column3: obvious utACK fa8071a0985700a4641ce77dac2cb2fa285d3afe\nthis would be one thing for which it'd make sense to have a linter: we really want to open *all* text files as explicitly utf-8 to avoid potential issues on the BSDs (where the locale is not always set).
@laanwj Always ping me if you want a linter :-)  I'll look in to it!
